document_name: Introduction to the templates transferred to the committees in accordance with Section 80 (3) and Section 92 of the Procedures
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DEU/2020/DEU-2020-01-01-Introduction to the templates transferred to the committees in accordance with Section 80 (3) and Section 92 of the Procedures_a53db49a4125d6707fd8bf646c3f81ee.pdf
document_description: The law on national certificate trading for fuel emissions (Brennstoffemissionshandelsgesetz) is part of the 2030 climate package and introduces emissions trading for the heating and transport sectors from 2021 onward. It notably aims at avoiding carbon leakage. Certificate prices were agreed in parliament around October 2020.
